Action: An error occurred while creating the backup.
Actie: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het aanmaken van de backup.

Action: An error occurred while writing to the backup file "%s".
Actie: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het wegschrijven van bestand "%s".

Action: Are you sure you want to delete the selected backup(s)?
Actie: Are you sure you want to delete the selected backup(s)?

Action: Backup file "%s" cannot be read from or written to.
Actie: Backup-bestand "%s" kan niet gelezen of beschreven worden.

Action: Backup file path was not specified.

Actie: Het Back-up bestand kan niet worden gelezen.

Action: Failed to delete one or several backups.
Actie: Failed to delete one or several backups.

Action: Not enough free space to create backup.
Actie: Not enough free space to create backup.

Action: Not enough permissions to create backup.
Actie: Not enough permissions to create backup.

Action: Not enough permissions to perform rollback
Actie: Not enough permissions to perform rollback

Action: Please either unselect the "Put store on the maintenance mode" checkbox or update your permissions to proceed with the backup."
Actie: Please either unselect the "Put store on the maintenance mode" checkbox or update your permissions to proceed with the backup."

Action: Please either unselect the "Put store on the maintenance mode" checkbox or update your permissions to proceed with the rollback."
Actie: Please either unselect the "Put store on the maintenance mode" checkbox or update your permissions to proceed with the rollback."

Action: Put store on the maintenance mode while backup's creation
Actie: Put store on the maintenance mode while backup's creation

Action: System couldn't put store on the maintenance mode
Actie: System couldn't put store on the maintenance mode

Action: The database and media backup has been created.
Actie: The database and media backup has been created.

Action: The database backup has been created.
Actie: The database backup has been created.

Action: The file was compressed with Zlib, but this extension is not installed on server.
Actie: Het bestand is samengebracht met Zlib, maar deze extensie is niet geinstalleerd op de server.

Action: The selected backup(s) has been deleted.
Actie: The selected backup(s) has been deleted.

Action: The system (excluding Media) backup has been created.
Actie: The system (excluding Media) backup has been created.

Action: The system backup has been created.
Actie: The system backup has been created.

Action: Unable to create backup. Please, try again later.
Actie: Kon geen backup maken. Probeer later opnieuw a.u.b.

Action: Unable to save the cron expression.
Actie: Het is niet mogelijk om deze cron op te slaan

Action: Wrong order of creation for new backup.
Actie: Onjuiste volgorde voor een nieuwe backup.

Action: You do not have sufficient permissions to enable Maintenance Mode during this operation.
Actie: You do not have sufficient permissions to enable Maintenance Mode during this operation.
